A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horribly disappointing movie. The characters felt forced\, the casting was HORRIBLE\, the jokes were bad\, the plot uninspired... overall just bad. I literally turned to my wife half way through and said \"This is a horrible movie.\" The last half hour was ok\, but didn't;t make up for the suckiness of the first 1.5 hours.
